scripts.delete:unwanted-assets: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const targetDir = path.join('_site', 'assets'); if (fs.existsSync(targetDir)) { fs.rmSync(targetDir, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('Removed directory: ' + targetDir); } else { console.log('Directory not found, skipping: ' + targetDir); }"
scripts.build: npm run build:jekyll && npm run delete:unwanted-assets && npm run optimize:css && npm run beasties:css && npm run minify:html && npm run brotli:compress
